languages.text: {n}Ваш самодовольный выкрик заставляет сборище моментально умолкнуть — и воззриться на вас в полном недоумении. Откуда-то доносится неловкий смешок.{/n}
{n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш самодовольный выкрик заставляет сборище моментально умолкнуть — и воззриться на вас в полном недоумении. Откуда-то доносится неловкий смешок.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

{n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你浮夸的发言让所有人陷入了沉默之中。众人困惑不已地盯着你，有人尴尬地轻笑了一声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你浮夸的发言让所有人陷入了沉默之中。众人困惑不已地盯着你，有人尴尬地轻笑了一声。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu pomposa declaración enmudece momentáneamente a los miembros del grupo, que te miran desconcertados. Alguno incluso ríe entre dientes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu pomposa declaración enmudece momentáneamente a los miembros del grupo, que te miran desconcertados. Alguno incluso ríe entre dientes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gösterişli duyurun, grubu bir anlığına susturup sana tam bir şaşkınlıkla bakmalarına neden oluyor. İçlerinden biri ise garip bir şekilde kıkırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gösterişli duyurun, grubu bir anlığına susturup sana tam bir şaşkınlıkla bakmalarına neden oluyor. İçlerinden biri ise garip bir şekilde kıkırdıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}気取った宣言によって一瞬、従者たちが静まりかえり、明らかに困惑した様子であなたを見る。誰かが不器用にクスクスと笑い始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}気取った宣言によって一瞬、従者たちが静まりかえり、明らかに困惑した様子であなたを見る。誰かが不器用にクスクスと笑い始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre déclaration pompeuse fait momentanément taire le groupe, qui vous dévisage avec stupéfaction. Quelqu'un laisse échapper un petit rire gêné.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre déclaration pompeuse fait momentanément taire le groupe, qui vous dévisage avec stupéfaction. Quelqu'un laisse échapper un petit rire gêné.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Erklärung bringt die Gruppe vorübergehend zum Schweigen. Alle starren dich völlig entgeistert an. Jemand stößt ein unsicheres Lachen aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your pompous declaration silences the group momentarily and they stare at you in utter bewilderment. Someone lets out an awkward chuckle.{/n}
